events.eventSummary: Everyone on SNAP will be forced to reapply to the program after massive fraud was revealed.Sources: - https://twitter.com/1528943647185678336/status/1990065518510805212
DoodiPals experienced a hack and Sharwa Finance had an exploit.Sources: - https://x.com/Whistleblowe007/status/1989561722823188757 - https://x.com/Whistleblowe007/status/1989880725433090398

dailyBrief: Today's cyber events highlight significant risks, with a major fraud incident affecting the SNAP program requiring all users to reapply, indicating widespread impact and high severity. Additionally, both DoodiPals and Sharwa Finance reported separate hack and exploit events, pointing to persistent threats targeting financial and online platforms. The combination of mass fraud and targeted cyber attacks suggests an elevated threat level, requiring increased vigilance and rapid response measures.
